title: Cassiopeia's Japanese voice
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eS0EvwlNxJU

I gotta say it was a big let down to me... I expected a japanese evil bitch type of voice, like the one Elise received https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NsWSk20o-dM

Why do you hate my waifu so much riot? ioi she always gets the very short end of the stick {{item:3151}} 

This is just my opinion though... as a cass main.

replies.body: I think the death sounds and the ultimate sounds are always the same for every language.
